caption.p: Antiviral activity of the essential oils obtained from C. indicum and C. morifolium flower heads versus vesicular stomatitis virus (VSV) ( A), hepatitis A (HAV) ( B) and herpes simplex type-1 (HSV-1) ( C) using acyclovir as a standard antiviral drug. The means with different stars are significantly different ( p < 0.05).
